channel.title: Srl include problem!
channel.description:
hi i got a small problem which i hope som1 can sort out for me :P
i just rebooted my pc, so i had to reinstall scar and srl etc....
and when i try and compile/run one of my scripts i get this error!
Line 802: [Error] (6138:11): Unknown identifier 'FindColorCircleD' in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Color.scar
this is line 802 in color:
{******************************************************************************* function FindColorCircle(var x, y: Integer; color, radius, MidPointx, MidPointy: Integer): Boolean; By: Freddy1990 Description: Searches for a color within a circle. *******************************************************************************} function FindColorCircle(var x, y: Integer; color, radius, MidPointx, MidPointy: Integer): Boolean; begin [u][i][b]Result := FindColorCircleD(x, y, color, radius, MidPointx, MidPointy, 0);[/b][/i][/u] end;
the line in red is line 802 ok?
thanks for all help :D

item.title: Srl include problem!
item.dc:creator: @Weibs Weibs
item.description:
@Weibs wrote:

That won’t get you SRL, which is what he’s having problems with.

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem!
item.dc:creator: @slinkyman24 slinkyman24
item.description:
@slinkyman24 wrote:

or… you could just go to File>Download includes>overwrite and walah!

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem!
item.dc:creator: @bullzeye95 bullzeye
item.description:
@bullzeye95 wrote:

When you download SRL, there should be a folder called plugins. Copy all the files in there and paste them in the SCAR plugins folder.

Read full topic

item.title: Srl include problem!
item.dc:creator: @hello_to_you_all hello to you all
item.description:
@hello_to_you_all wrote:

hi i got a small problem which i hope som1 can sort out for me

i just rebooted my pc, so i had to reinstall scar and srl etc…

and when i try and compile/run one of my scripts i get this error!

Line 802: [Error] (6138:11): Unknown identifier ‘FindColorCircleD’ in script C:\Program Files\SCAR 2.03\includes\srl\srl\core\Color.scar

this is line 802 in color:

{*******************************************************************************
function FindColorCircle(var x, y: Integer; color, radius, MidPointx, MidPointy: Integer): Boolean;
By: Freddy1990
Description: Searches for a color within a circle.
*******************************************************************************}
function FindColorCircle(var x, y: Integer; color, radius, MidPointx, MidPointy: Integer): Boolean;
begin
Result := FindColorCircleD(x, y, color, radius, MidPointx, MidPointy, 0);
end;

the line in red is line 802 ok?

thanks for all help

Read full topic
